about_the_game:
Benjiro, a student from high-tech and traditional Japan, moves to the U.S. with hopes of embracing a new life filled with freedom and excitement. The moment he steps into his university dorm, he’s ready to shed the cultural restraints of his homeland and dive into the unknown.

However, the university life isn’t as welcoming as he’d hoped. His first day at the university is mostly uneventful, until Martha, the university president, gives him a brief tour of the campus, revealing the rules and lifestyle he must navigate. What begins as a typical introduction quickly turns into an unforgettable adventure that opens up a world of new relationships.

As Benjiro settles into his new life, he must balance his studies, a part-time job, and the pursuit of freedom that lies in exploring his desires. With each new encounter, he faces decisions that will shape his time at university and his future.

Will Benjiro embrace the full spectrum of student life, or will he struggle with his repressed desires? Sex Dorm🔞 offers a bold and provocative journey where your choices lead to multiple paths and experiences. Dive in and experience what university life could be when freedom knows no bounds.

Key features:

  • Intuitive gameplay that rewards your creativity – Make bold choices and watch the consequences unfold in this immersive visual novel. Every decision shapes Benjiro’s journey, from his relationships to his deepest desires.

  • Fully animated 3D characters – Get up close and personal with fully realized, real-time 3D characters, bringing each interaction to life with smooth animations that enhance your experience.

  • Endless spicy scenarios to spice up your college life – Explore a variety of seductive and thrilling encounters, each with its own twists and turns. From spontaneous hookups to forbidden encounters, you’ll never know what’s around the corner.

  • Explore a dynamic, open-world campus – Roam freely through your university and dorm, uncovering hidden spots, secret locations, and spontaneous events that lead to unforgettable experiences.

  • Convenient one-handed play option for full immersion – Experience the game in your own style with a one-handed play mode, designed for maximum comfort and a totally hands-on experience ( ͡~ ͜ʖ ͡°).

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains explicit sexual content, including nudity, sex acts, and masturbation, all portrayed graphically. These elements are integral to the story and character development. All characters are over 18.

name: Sex Dorm🔞

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or above
  • Processor: Intel or AMD
  • Graphics: Direct X compatible
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Sex Dorm🔞 – A visual novel where you play as a student from Japan who moves to the U.S. to experience college life. Explore new cultures, build relationships, work part-time, and dive into your hidden desires in the world of university life.
